resources.string: Thank you for allowing us to do so
For accurate prayer times, we would like to use your gps data to determine where you are in the world. Is that alright?
No thank you. I would rather do it manually
I believe i found it. Is this is?
Theme are not fully working yet. Rounded corners disappear if you change the background. Also, the corner doesnt work.
This qibla compass is still in beta.
Institute of Geophysics, University of Tehran
This is your primary widget. You can only have 1 primary widget, which will be the one that is shown when you open the primary app
You can only have 1 primary widget, which will be the one that is shown when you open the primary app. Click here to set this widget as your primary
It\'s possible to create different widgets with different prayer times. In order to know them apart, please give them a name
Please enter the desired name. The field can not be empty

Different countries may use different calculation methods. Per default, when you create a new widget, we use your location to try to determine what kind of calculation method you use. If it\'s wrong, you can change it here.

In locations at higher latitude, twilight may persist throughout the night during some months of the year. In these abnormal periods, the determination of Fajr and Isha is not possible using the usual formulas mentioned in the previous section. To overcome this problem, several solutions have been proposed, three of which are described below.
Select the juristic you follow for determining Asr
If the times are almost correct, and you just need to adjust a few minutes difference, you can do so here.
Change them all at the same time
Tilt and move your phone like this to calibrate the compass:
You either didn\'t add a widget or you don\'t have a primary widget!
To add a widget, please go to your homescreen
Long press in an empty spot
Find Salah Widget, and choose the size that you want.
Hint: Instead, you can also click the date on the screen to select another date
Type in the abbreviation of your state (e.g. ny for new york)
Found these holidays for your selection
Couldn\'t save holidays. Try again or contact developer
You\'ve added a widget to your home screen. For at fortsætte skal du angive tidsforskellen mellem København og din by.\nVenligst benyt en eksisterende salah kalender til at finde forskellen.
Du får her en forevisning af Salah tiderne for dine indstillinger
Du kan indstille tidsforskellen samt om det skal være hanafi tider
Please change GPS settings to High Accuracy or go outside.
Qibla won\'t work on your phone as it doesn\'t have a compass
Enable Adhan for the following Salah
Choose how you want to be reminded of Salah
When it\'s Salah time, vibrate the phone.
When it\'s Salah time, play the Adhan
When it\'s Salah time, give me a notification
Click here to test your Adhan
